message.title: Effortless Rides, Anytime, Anywhere!
message.message: Welcome to our service! Get ready to experience seamless ride-hailing at your fingertips. Discover safe, fast, and reliable rides whenever you need them.

message.title: Choose Your Destination with Ease!
message.message: Select your pickup and drop-off locations effortlessly and watch as we connect you with nearby drivers for a smooth journey.

message.title: Sit Back and Enjoy the Journey!
message.message: With real-time updates and trusted drivers, your journey is in good hands. Letâ€™s get you to your destination safely and comfortably.
